actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a temporary deduction for interest on unsecured credit card debt.

summary.text: Cash Back Reward Act of 2010 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a tax deduction for interest paid on an unsecured credit card in 2010. Limits the amount of such deduction to $5,000 ($10,000 for married couples filing a joint tax return).

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a temporary deduction for interest on unsecured credit card debt.
